sentences.sContent: The ambrosial aroma of the roast whetted our appetites.
sentences.sContent_eng: The ambrosial aroma of the roast whetted our appetites.
sentences.sCn: 烤肉的香味刺激了我们的食欲。

sentences.sContent: Next, you can delicately dip your content into a warm bath of ambrosial CSS—but before you jump to the hard candy shell, there are some additional considerations.
sentences.sContent_eng: Next, you can delicately dip your content into a warm bath of ambrosial CSS—but before you jump to the hard candy shell, there are some additional considerations.
sentences.sCn: 接下来，你可以将内容小心地浸入芳香美味的CSS暖浴中了。不过在你跳进糖果硬壳之前，还有些额外的考虑。

remMethod.val: ambrosia (美食， 神的食物) + l → 特别美味的

words.tran: 适用于神的（等于ambrosial）；美味的
特别美味的食物；神的食物
